name: Unistroke Gesture Recognition for Construct 3
description:
This is a Construct 3 project template which integrates the $1 Unistroke Recognizer JS library to provide gesture recognition in C3. Add a gesture based interface to your game, good for mobile / touch, create a spell casting interface???

Demo

This project template includes C3 functions to call for recognizing gestures, adding custom gestures, reseting custom gestures.

There is also an example of loading a captured custom gesture at the start of runtime.

For more details on this recognizer, please see this link. See the javascript library for the original licensing information for the library (New BSD License.) 

Please consider donating to support the development of future C3 effects/addons/templates!
